016package io.micronaut.maven.testresources;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonProperty;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonRootName;
021import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
022
023/**
024 * Base configuration class for Test Resources.
025 *
026 * @author Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
027 * @since 3.5.1
028 */
029@JsonRootName("configuration")
030@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = true)
031public class TestResourcesConfiguration {
032
033    public static final String DISABLED = "false";
034    public static final String CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX = "micronaut.test.resources.";
035
036    private static final String PROPERTY_ENABLED = "enabled";
037
038    /**
039     * Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
040     */
041    @Parameter(property =  CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + PROPERTY_ENABLED, defaultValue = DISABLED)
042    @JsonProperty(PROPERTY_ENABLED)
043    protected boolean testResourcesEnabled;
044
045    /**
046     * Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds
047     * (e.g different projects, even built with different build tools).
048     */
049    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "shared", defaultValue = DISABLED)
050    protected boolean shared;
051
052    /**
053     * Allows configuring a namespace for the shared test resources server. This can be used in case it makes sense to
054     * have different instances of shared services, for example when independent builds sets share different services.
055     *
056     * @since 3.5.1
057     */
058    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "namespace")
059    protected String sharedServerNamespace;
060
061    /**
062     * Allows starting the test resources server in debug mode. The server will be started with the ability
063     * to attach a remote debugger on port 8000.
064     *
065     * @since 4.1.1
066     */
067    @Parameter(property = CONFIG_PROPERTY_PREFIX + "debug-server", defaultValue = DISABLED)
068    protected boolean debugServer;
069
070    /**
071     * @return Whether to enable or disable Micronaut test resources support.
072     */
073    public boolean isTestResourcesEnabled() {
074        return testResourcesEnabled;
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * @return Whether the test resources service should be shared between independent builds.
079     */
080    public boolean isShared() {
081        return shared;
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * @return The shared server namespace (if any).
086     */
087    public String getSharedServerNamespace() {
088        return sharedServerNamespace;
089    }
090}
